activities:
Processing employee and limited customer data.

With regard to employee data, Endavo Media and Communications, Inc. (“Endavo”) will receive and process limited information of Bulgarian residents, including, name, salary, and, in some instances, birth date.  Upon confirmation of Safe Harbor status, Endavo will notify – through a specific communication – affected residents of the company’s participation in the Safe Harbor program.  That notification will direct residents to the Company’s website, will confirm that the policies regarding the Safe Harbor principles listed on the website apply equally to their information, and will provide contact information for complaints/inquiries.
contactoff1: 555 North Point Center East, 4th Floor, Alpharetta, GA
personaldata: Employee human resource data and customer contact information processed manually and electronically
